alert.note: Alert for Clay (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:02PM EDT until June 14 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Western Clay County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/. * At 502 PM EDT/402 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Abbeville, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Newville, Haleburg, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Walter F George Lake, Edwin, Standleys Store, Hayes, Scottsboro Crossroads, Double Bridges, Graball, Dancey, Thomas Mill Creek, Fort Gaines-Clay Airport, Barnes, Hardwickburg, Capps and Otho. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
